title: One of the best sequels of all time
review: When I went to the movies to see Blade Runner 2049 and I left the movies after the 3 hours that the film lasted I thought ... a movie masterpiece science fiction, I was one of those people who admired the 1982 Blade Runner be of my favorite films, this second part is a truth sequel that is at the level of the original, both in plot, configuration, soundtrack ... and characters, it's a slow movie (like the first one) which in my opinion was a few minutes away, that is my only complaint regarding to this film I am glad that Denis Villeneuve was in charge of that draft. You rarely see these sequels in the movies ...
